text: 6:34 Dɨboboniba 27:17; 1 Atriviba 22:17; 2 Eghaghaniba 18:16; Esekiel 34:5; Matyu 9:36Ezɨ Iesus ghua dɨpar dadarimɨn otogha garima, gumazamizir bar avɨriba iti. A men gari, me mati sipsipbar mɨn amua, ghuaviba puvatɨgha asaghasazibar mɨn puram arui. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a bar men apangkufi. Egha a bizir avɨribar men sure gami.6:34 Nɨ sipsipɨn mɨngarim gɨfoghsɨ, akɨnafarir kamɨn akɨrangɨn itir Akar Mɨngaribar gan.
